item.title: SQL Injection Video
item.description: A video I made about SQL Injection. Took about 5 hours total. I don’t do video editing or stuff like this frequently, but thought I’d post it here. Enjoy! Resources: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o7GODnWYYjE https://github.com/HenryFBP/sqlinjection-training-app/blob/master/video-script.md https://github.com/HenryFBP/sqlinjection-training-app I used: OpenShot (It is genuinely painful to use for keyframes or splicing/positioning, please use DaVinci Resolve or kdenlive instead) Audacity GIMP Visual Studio Code I want to say thanks to the original repository creators, AppSecCo, for putting this source code on GitHub.
